<JD_START>
Job Title: Group Director, Global Measurement Lead

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Analyst, Marketing

Description:
Global Group Director, Media Measurement – Colgate Global Team (NYC)

About Wavemaker

We believe there always is a better way to grow. We positively provoke growth for our clients by reshaping consumer decision-making and experiences through media, content and technology. The Wavemaker way is globally consistent. Fueled by the world’s most powerful consumer data, we understand where and how marketing can intervene decisively to help brands win more sales.

Our name is our mission and our method. To make waves, you need to be provocative, even fearless. We do our best work for brave brands and people who want to be challenged to go further and faster. We know it’s not easy, but if it’s in you, we will get it out of you.

Our 7,600 People Across 90 Markets Provoke Growth For Some Of The World’s Leading Brands And Businesses. Our Attitude Of Positive Provocation Is Enabled By

 deep knowledge we have of our clients’ business confidence to challenge what’s gone before the support to go further than we thought possible

We are a part of GroupM, WPP’s global media investment management company. Discover more on wavemakerglobal.com, Twitter and LinkedIn

Global Group Director, Media Measurement

Role Context

We are looking for a talented Media Measurement (Research & Analytics) Group Director to join our Colgate Global leadership team in NYC. In this role, you will be responsible to manage client relationships; work collaboratively within the WPPCP Integrated team, and support and guide the global WM Measurement and Analytics community working on CP.

You are curious and always eager to learn. You are excited by the challenges that the industry is facing and want to help your clients continue to evolve their media approach to drive more effective outcomes. You understand how to present complex concepts in a simple way and have become a data storyteller, capable of inspiring our clients and our teams.

Core Responsibilities

 Set the vision, strategy, and roadmap across media measurement solutions in collaboration with the Colgate global clients Partner with clients to deliver thought leadership, look for new ways to enhance, develop or execute data-driven solutions and insights through audience, measurement, advanced analytics strategy and, business analysis, driven by partners and technologies Develop strategic relationships with clients by providing support to solve broad strategic marketing problems, Become a trusted advisor to clients and consult on growth opportunities and identify new way to use data to solve business challenges and support growth Support, enable and lead the global WM measurement and analytics teams working on CP Building and launching a systematic Test and Learn approach that can be productised and universally applied across the CP account Input into establishing simple processes that enable the fast and agile extraction of insights from measurement to ensure continuous learning and improvement related to outcomes from media Create a global community across CP where best practices, results and opportunities are continuously shared and optimized Contribute to Client Growth plan through strategic and actionable inputs strengthening client relationship and satisfaction.

Required Skills / Experience

 8-10 years + relevant work experience in research, data, insights, analytics, advanced analytics and technology with expertise in digital media Experience working with Nielsen, Kantar, etc as measurement solutions Thought leader + Doer Passion for online advertising and emerging technologies in the digital landscape Strong analytical, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills Ability to work collaboratively with strong work ethic Comfortable working in ambiguous situations to determine new solutions and opportunities Confident decision-making framework, ability to clearly define best path forward for the situation at hand Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously Experience leading, training, and growing a team with diverse skillsets (ideally a global team across multiple teams and markets) Confident speaking to groups with varying analytics backgrounds and distilling complicated analytics/data concepts Creative problem solver The ability to thrive in a fast-paced and deadline-driven environment Strategic Thinker & Doer

The base salary for this position at the time of this posting may range from $125,000 to $295,000. Individual compensation varies based on job-related factors, including business needs, experience, level of responsibility and qualifications. We offer a competitive benefits package, please visit https://www.wpp.com/people/wellbeing/benefits-at-wpp-in-the-us for more details.

GroupM and all its affiliates embrace and celebrate diversity, inclusivity, and equal opportunity. We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. We are a worldwide media agency network that represents global clients. The more inclusive we are, the more great work we can create together.

Reference ID: oKRXqfwI

Experience Level (if available): Director
<JD_END>
